commit.message:
plugin-api.h (ld_plugin_set_extra_library_path): New.

2010-06-21  Rafael Espindola  <espindola@google.com>

	* plugin-api.h (ld_plugin_set_extra_library_path): New.
	(ld_plugin_tag): Add LDPT_SET_EXTRA_LIBRARY_PATH.
	(ld_plugin_tv): Add tv_set_extra_library_path.

From-SVN: r161116
